games.saloon

Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • joueur.BaseGameObject
      • games.saloon.GameObject
        • games.saloon.Player

  • public class Player
extends GameObject
    A player in this game. Every AI controls one player.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      java.lang.String clientType
      What type of client this is, e.g.
      java.util.List<Cowboy> cowboys
      Every Cowboy owned by this Player.
      int kills
      How many enemy Cowboys this player's team has killed.
      boolean lost
      If the player lost the game or not.
      java.lang.String name
      The name of the player.
      Player opponent
      This player's opponent in the game.
      java.lang.String reasonLost
      The reason why the player lost the game.
      java.lang.String reasonWon
      The reason why the player won the game.
      int rowdiness
      How rowdy their team is.
      int score
      How many times their team has played a piano.
      int siesta
      0 when not having a team siesta.
      double timeRemaining
      The amount of time (in ns) remaining for this AI to send commands.
      boolean won
      If the player won the game or not.
      YoungGun youngGun
      The YoungGun this Player uses to call in new Cowboys.

    • Field Detail

      • clientType

        public java.lang.String clientType
        What type of client this is, e.g. 'Python', 'JavaScript', or some other language. For potential data mining purposes.

      • cowboys

        public java.util.List<Cowboy> cowboys
        Every Cowboy owned by this Player.

      • kills

        public int kills
        How many enemy Cowboys this player's team has killed.

      • lost

        public boolean lost
        If the player lost the game or not.

      • name

        public java.lang.String name
        The name of the player.

      • opponent

        public Player opponent
        This player's opponent in the game.

      • reasonLost

        public java.lang.String reasonLost
        The reason why the player lost the game.

      • reasonWon

        public java.lang.String reasonWon
        The reason why the player won the game.

      • rowdiness

        public int rowdiness
        How rowdy their team is. When it gets too high their team takes a collective siesta.

      • score

        public int score
        How many times their team has played a piano.

      • siesta

        public int siesta
        0 when not having a team siesta. When greater than 0 represents how many turns left for the team siesta to complete.

      • timeRemaining

        public double timeRemaining
        The amount of time (in ns) remaining for this AI to send commands.

      • won

        public boolean won
        If the player won the game or not.

      • youngGun

        public YoungGun youngGun
        The YoungGun this Player uses to call in new Cowboys.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Player

        public Player()
        Creates a new instance of a Player. Used during game initialization, do not call directly.
